A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is definitely not a perfect film\, but I can honestly say it was good.  It features some of the most breathtaking images in Star Wars history\, but side plots and occasional ridiculous moments bog down the film toward the middle and end of the film. The biggest detriment to the narrative is its humor. Often\, it feels disconnected from the drama and leaves much to be desired. Overall\, it is still an enjoyable film.
